forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early followed by partly cloudy skies and gusty winds this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Cloudy skies will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 12C. NE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 53F. NE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
